abstract.p: BBC Worldwide, commercial arm of British Broadcasting Corp, names Leo Burnett Worldwide as first agency to help develop its worldwide brands like Teletubbies on international basis (S)

block.p: BBC Worldwide, the commercial arm of the British Broadcasting Corporation, has named Leo Burnett Worldwide, part of the B Com3 Group, as the first agency to help develop its worldwide brands like the Teletubbies on an international basis. Billings were estimated at more than $15 million. Mary Collins, a spokeswoman for BBC Worldwide in London, said the decision came after a six-month review that had been narrowed to Burnett and Leagas Delaney in London. The account had previously been handled on a project basis; the work will be coordinated from the Burnett London office.
